labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It shows the user info which does not show roles or the user's nickname.
data.expected_result: When clicking on the mention it will show the guild member info, not the user info.
data.short_description: Mentions in embeds on click don't show the member, but instead show the user.
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an embed with a mention. - Click on the mention.
